orig_text: All prefixes expect those beginning with used.
notes: Hmmm, looks like part of the sentence ended up in /dev/null.  (Also, was "expect" perhaps meant to be "except"?)  It looks to me as though this happened between kerberos-clarifications-04 and -05.  If I had to guess, it was probably trying to say that you can roll your own private-use prefixes (beginning with "X-" or "x-"), but any other prefixes must go through the official registry process, per RFC 6111?

The field is named "cksumtype" according to section 5.2

 --VERIFIER NOTES--
Correction - The field is named in section 5.2.9.
